rows.label: qev025802_MSG0001
rows.name:
Go forth, Bringer of Miracles! Share your pestilent gift
with all the Ma-non in in in New LA, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025802_MSG0002
rows.name: Wh-who is it? What are you doing here?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025802_SEL0011
rows.name:
Insist on knowing what Malyteth
has done to the reservoir.

rows.label: qev025802_SEL0021
rows.name:
Explain to Malyteth that Staccata
asked you to come investigate.

rows.label: qev025802_MSG0004
rows.name: This bottle's not... I didn't do anything![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025802_MSG0005
rows.name: Rgh, that blasphemer! He had to interfere here too![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025802_MSG0006
rows.name: Well, th-this bottle's not... It's nothing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025802_MSG0007
rows.name:
Rrgh, not here... This can't stop here!
Not after the Bringer of Miracles has grown
so so large on this medicine, right?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025802_SEL0031
rows.name: Demand to know what was inside the bottle.

rows.label: qev025802_MSG0008
rows.name:
This is the miracle water that makes the other miracle
water be miraculous, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025802_MSG0009
rows.name:
And you will never have it, will you? No? No no.
Bringer of Miracles, hear my prayer, won't you?
Make manifest your power now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025802_MSG0010
rows.name:
You're not taking this bottle, are you? No? No no.
Bringer of Miracles, hear my prayer, won't you?
Make manifest your power now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025802_MSG0011
rows.name:
Ah! I see him, yes? I can see my god... I knew... Yes...
Fraisie, you you you are the true...deliverer of the
Ma-non... *gasp*[ST:wait ]
